        Creates a new project on disk and stores its path in the database

      • createFromImport

        void createFromImport(ProjectDTO projectDTO)
               throws BizzException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Creates a new project on disk and stores its path in the database from a specified import
        Parameters:
        projectDTO - the path to the archive to import
        Throws:
        BizzException - if the project in the archive has a problem or if a similar project already exists
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred during finding/opening the archive
